casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Raymond RICHARD. No. 481P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2007. LaToya B. Powell, Assistant Attorney General, C. Branson Vickory, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th day of September 2007 by Defendant for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu by order of the Court in conference this the 8th day of November 2007."
